client_profile_higher_education_0_univer: FH Joanneum University of Applied Sciences
client_description_Summary_Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Mayr Schnell Reiter at a charity gala in Vienna. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Mayr Schnell Reiter is a 62 year old and comes from Austria.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
client_description_Family_Background: Mayr Schnell Reiter is married to Victoria. Mayr and Victoria have 3 children, named Franziska, Gertrud and Hinterleitner.
client_description_Education_Background:
Mayr finished secondary school at Lycée Français de Vienne in 1982.
Mayr graduated from FH Joanneum University of Applied Sciences in 1985, completing his higher education.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Having worked for over 39 years, Mayr Schnell Reiter brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
Mayr Schnell Reiter began his professional journey as a Software Developer at Microsoft Austria GmbH in 1986, laying the foundation for future success.
In 1988, he moved to Microsoft Austria GmbH to work as a Startup Founder, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He managed to save approximately 850000 EUR from his earnings at all companies.
He owns townhouse in Klagenfurt, where he resides. It is worth 816000 EUR.

In addition to his primary residence, he owns villa in Tulln an der Donau worth 1790000 EUR.

Moreover, he has invested in additional property in Bruck an der Mur, giving possiblity for generating additional income. The flat is valued at 720000 EUR.

He does not have any inheritances.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
